name: Codeinum
Relationship: Compare: OPIUM; AGARICUS; HYOSCY.; AMMON. BROM.

Respiratory: Short and irritating cough; worse, at night
Stomach: Spasmodic pain at pit of stomach
Great thirst, with desire for bitter substances
Head: Pain from occiput to back of neck
Skin of face and scalp sore after neuralgia

details: Trembling of whole body. Involuntary twitching of muscles of arms and lower limbs. ITCHING, with feeling of warmth, numbness and prickling. Diabetes.Dry, teasing, incessant cough; twitching of muscles, especially those of eyelids
dosage: One-quarter of a grain doses to third trituration.
